text: List of ferry operators in Japan lists car ferry operators in Japan. The list includes companies operating now. It also lists foreign operators that have international car ferry lines to Japan. English names might be tentative. ==International== Xīnjiànzhēn of China Japan International Ferry at the Port of Kobe. ===China=== *China Express Line (Yānjīng ) *China Japan International Ferry (Xīnjiànzhēn ) *Tianjin Jīn-Shén Ferry (Yānjīng ) ===Japan=== *Camellia Line *Shanghai Ferry *SHK Line Group **Kampu Ferry **Suzhou Shimonoseki Ferry *::Freight only.
